uu76omw.textbox_title: Build Beautiful Sites With Drag & Drop
uu76omw.textbox_content:
PageLines DMS powers all our WordPress themes and allows you to build beautiful pages with drag & drop simplicity.
DMS boasts a load of useful features that sets our themes apart from the competition:

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using the PageLines drag & drop builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: DMS is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts, fonts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: eCommerce Capability
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: SEO Standards
item6.text: DMS was building with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good and rank well on search results.

item7.title: 50+ Sections
item7.text: 50+ sections with options to insert into your pages so you can create amazing layouts. More added all the time with updates.

item8.title: Boxed or Fullwidth Layouts
item8.text: Quickly switch between boxed or fullwidth layout. No need to dig into the stylesheet to get the layout you need.

item9.title: Clean & Minimal
item9.text: A clean and minimal design, not only will it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item10.title: Clean Code
item10.text: Well commented and clean code makes it easy for you to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimize and expandable.

item11.title: HTML5
item11.text: The theme uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards.

item12.title: CSS3
item12.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as element animation on page scroll.

changing to an alternate color style, adding Google Analytics code, experience creative freedom with DMS.

u1wd9fb.textbox_content: Thousands of people work in the West Wing, the East Wing, the Cabinet, and the Executive Office of the President. Learn more about the people who carry out the priorities of the Obama-Biden Administration.

uwqz2wk.textbox_content: Under the United States Constitution, the President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States. As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the highest political office in the United States by influence and recognition.

udym4ic.textbox_content: The President directs the work of the board by chairing meetings, setting agendas, appointing committees and assuring their proper functioning, and supervising the board administrator. The board president also services as liaison to management, supervising the general manager or management team.

uu76omw.textbox_title: Build Beautiful Sites With Drag & Drop
uu76omw.textbox_content:
PageLines DMS powers all our WordPress themes and allows you to build beautiful pages with drag & drop simplicity.
DMS boasts a load of useful features that sets our themes apart from the competition:

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using the PageLines drag & drop builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: DMS is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts, fonts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: eCommerce Capability
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: SEO Standards
item6.text: DMS was building with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good and rank well on search results.

item7.title: 50+ Sections
item7.text: 50+ sections with options to insert into your pages so you can create amazing layouts. More added all the time with updates.

item8.title: Boxed or Fullwidth Layouts
item8.text: Quickly switch between boxed or fullwidth layout. No need to dig into the stylesheet to get the layout you need.

item9.title: Clean & Minimal
item9.text: A clean and minimal design, not only will it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item10.title: Clean Code
item10.text: Well commented and clean code makes it easy for you to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimize and expandable.

item11.title: HTML5
item11.text: The theme uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards.

item12.title: CSS3
item12.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as element animation on page scroll.

ulqgxip.textbox_content:
Making simple changes without touching code, like adding your own logo, 
changing to an alternate color style, adding Google Analytics code, experience creative freedom with DMS.

item1.title: Lines of Code

item3.title: Sections

item1.title: Step 1
item1.text: Open the PageLines front-end editor and add a canvas section.

item2.title: Step 2
item2.text: Upload your background video .mp4 file or image for your parallax background.

item3.title: Step 3
item3.text: Customize settings and save, you've just made a section in under 10 seconds!

ux7bhtf.textbox_content:
You can insert icons anywhere you want via the built-in Font Awesome icon options.
Font Awesome gives you scalable vector icons that can instantly be customized size,
color, drop shadow, and anything that can be done.

uifmhix.textbox_content:
Want to adjust fonts? You can easily switch fonts for all text elements through the options panel
Choose from 600+ free Google web fonts, Each font comes with preview.

uatiuxl.textbox_content: All page layouts are flexible in various mobile devices. All elements are enhanced for Retina displays.

un8nxau.textbox_title: Pro eCommerce Out of the Box
un8nxau.textbox_content:
DMS comes with full eCommerce support right out of the box!
No need to mess with styling to fit your site perfectly.

uoht0us.textbox_content:
New in DMS2, embed any number of videos into your pages.
You can choose any column width and also display self hosted html5 videos

uvyneoa.textbox_content:
We care about our customers and provide support and updates with our product.
You can make sure you are running the latest version with the click of a button with the PageLines Updater.

um10wby.textbox_content: WhiteHousePro's usage is intended to be hugely diverse. This Theme is packaged with custom sections that enhance the functionally of DMS and extend the possibilities.

u1wd9fb.textbox_content: Thousands of people work in the West Wing, the East Wing, the Cabinet, and the Executive Office of the President. Learn more about the people who carry out the priorities of the Obama-Biden Administration.

uwqz2wk.textbox_content: Under the United States Constitution, the President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States. As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the highest political office in the United States by influence and recognition.

udym4ic.textbox_content: The President directs the work of the board by chairing meetings, setting agendas, appointing committees and assuring their proper functioning, and supervising the board administrator. The board president also services as liaison to management, supervising the general manager or management team.

draft.textbox_title: Build Beautiful Sites With Drag & Drop
draft.textbox_content:
PageLines DMS powers all our WordPress themes and allows you to build beautiful pages with drag & drop simplicity.
DMS boasts a load of useful features that sets our themes apart from the competition:

live.textbox_title: Build Beautiful Sites With Drag & Drop
live.textbox_content:
PageLines DMS powers all our WordPress themes and allows you to build beautiful pages with drag & drop simplicity.
DMS boasts a load of useful features that sets our themes apart from the competition:

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using the PageLines drag & drop builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: DMS is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts, fonts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: eCommerce Capability
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: SEO Standards
item6.text: DMS was building with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good and rank well on search results.

item7.title: 50+ Sections
item7.text: 50+ sections with options to insert into your pages so you can create amazing layouts. More added all the time with updates.

item8.title: Boxed or Fullwidth Layouts
item8.text: Quickly switch between boxed or fullwidth layout. No need to dig into the stylesheet to get the layout you need.

item9.title: Clean & Minimal
item9.text: A clean and minimal design, not only will it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item10.title: Clean Code
item10.text: Well commented and clean code makes it easy for you to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimize and expandable.

item11.title: HTML5
item11.text: The theme uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards.

item12.title: CSS3
item12.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as element animation on page scroll.

draft.textbox_content: Thousands of people work in the West Wing, the East Wing, the Cabinet, and the Executive Office of the President. Learn more about the people who carry out the priorities of the Obama-Biden Administration.

live.textbox_content: Thousands of people work in the West Wing, the East Wing, the Cabinet, and the Executive Office of the President. Learn more about the people who carry out the priorities of the Obama-Biden Administration.

draft.textbox_content: Under the United States Constitution, the President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States. As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the highest political office in the United States by influence and recognition.

live.textbox_content: Under the United States Constitution, the President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States. As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the highest political office in the United States by influence and recognition.

draft.textbox_content: The President directs the work of the board by chairing meetings, setting agendas, appointing committees and assuring their proper functioning, and supervising the board administrator. The board president also services as liaison to management, supervising the general manager or management team.

live.textbox_content: The President directs the work of the board by chairing meetings, setting agendas, appointing committees and assuring their proper functioning, and supervising the board administrator. The board president also services as liaison to management, supervising the general manager or management team.

DMS allows you to take full control over your WordPress site

item1.title: PageLines DMS
item1.text:

Build any layout you can imagine with drag and drop.

draft.textbox_content: Save time by visually building and editing your website on the go.  Build professional layouts in minutes without accessing the admin panel.

live.textbox_content: Save time by visually building and editing your website on the go.  Build professional layouts in minutes without accessing the admin panel.

draft.textbox_title: Style your site the way you want it
draft.textbox_content: All websites should different so use built in site settings to modify styling and match your brand. With built in typography and color options you can change visual appearance literally in seconds!

live.textbox_content: All websites should different so use built in site settings to modify styling and match your brand. With built in typography and color options you can change visual appearance literally in seconds!

and come to dinner on time.

Shortcodes are just short bits of code that cut down on repetitive strings of HTML, and can be inserted anywhere in your site.

A shortcode is a descriptive bit of text wrapped in square brackets, e.g. [ pl_button ] – which could be dropped into your post to display a stylized button.

Shortcodes are just short bits of code that cut down on repetitive strings of HTML, and can be inserted anywhere in your site.

A shortcode is a descriptive bit of text wrapped in square brackets, e.g. [ pl_button ] – which could be dropped into your post to display a stylized button.
